description:
Your joints are going to thank you for this. Beneath the ergonomic and proprietary grips is a streamlined shock to take away those annoying vibrations to make for a smooth hike. Coupled with its cork grips and 4 season flex tips, this pole can go from the glacier to the west coast trail with ease.

  • Ergonomic grips with Bloom™ extensions allow for perfect handling in any weather
  • Bloom™ is an algae infused foam to keep your hands fresh throughout your hike
  • Breathable, moisture-wicking solution 2.0 straps are made from recycled materials
  • 3 section design keeps things sturdy and straight, making things easy to open and pack away in seconds
  • Durable soft touch FlickLock+ clamp allows length adjustments and locks securely
  • Interchangeable carbide tips and a hidden 1.5mm hex bit make for easy maintenance
name: Black Diamond Pursuit Shock Trekking Poles - Unisex
